name: Aqours
description: Aqours (pronounced as "aqua") is a school idol group that was originally formed and led by Kanan Matsuura two years prior to falling apart and was eventually succeeded by Chika Takami in Love Live! Sunshine!!. They were the school idol group of Uranohoshi Girls' High School. The original group consisted of three members, while the new group consisted of nine members. At the beginning of the movie, the group continues with six of the members at Numazu High School following their temporary integration at Seishin High School. They debuted with the song Kimi no Kokoro wa Kagayaiteru kai?.
